metadata.title: RZ/T2L: How should I handle unused pins?

sections.content:
Question:
How should I handle unused pins?
Answer:
Be careful because the handling differs depending on the pin. 
Handle the unused pins in reference to the following items. 
RZ/T2L Group User’s Manual: Hardware (r01uh0985ej0100-rzt2l)
16.5 Handling of Unused Pins
Table 16.24 Handling of unused pins
Suitable Products
RZ/T2L
